thread.title: Simple to sexy: S.F.’s Halloween costumes through the ages
thread.title_full: Simple to sexy: S.F.’s Halloween costumes through the ages - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Beth Spotswood
title: Simple to sexy: S.F.’s Halloween costumes through the ages
text:
Photo: Chronicle Staff, The Chronicle Oct. 31, 1948: A scene from Halloween in San Francisco in 1948. Oct. 31, 1948: A scene from Halloween in San Francisco in 1948.
Chuck Nicklow is helping a stressed-out middle-aged woman track down some mid-level Mickey Mouse ears. The Costumes on Haight manager reaches up past tubes of fake blood and itchy thigh-highs to pull down an array of options. Oct. 31, 1948: A scene from Halloween in San Francisco in 1948. Oct. 31, 1948: A scene from Halloween in San Francisco in 1948.
Chuck Nicklow is helping a stressed-out middle-aged woman track down some mid-level Mickey Mouse ears. The Costumes on Haight manager reaches up past tubes of fake blood and itchy thigh-highs to pull down an array of options.
